Apply For Your Place On The Teacher Training Course

If you are interested in the course or require any additional information please phone 07792 557 105 for an informal chat. An application form can then be sent out to you and an interview arranged.
Early booking is advisable, as numbers are limited to ensure individual attention.
Alternatively you can email Steve at info@shamayoga.org.uk or write to:

Shamayoga
2b Westwick Crescent
Sheffield
S8 7DG
